nodes.bodyText:
It's better to avoid getInShadowRoot usage.
$("about-view").id("navigate-hello")

That's much much nicer, but about-view is the shadowRoot holder not the item we want.
We should trash the helper methods and update all tests.

Is it enough to check the URL only ?
Should it also check that the content of the page is expected ?
Seems I've forgotten to add the check that the button is visible.
